casebody.data:
Danny D. AULD, II, and Tamara Auld, Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
MCLAREN REGIONAL MEDICAL CENTER, Gjon G. Dushaj, MD, and Paul W. Brown, DO, Defendants-Appellants,
and
Hatem Ataya, MD, and Hatem M. Ataya, MD, PC, Defendants. SC: 159646
COA: 341335 Supreme Court of Michigan. August 23, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiffs-appellees to extend the time for filing their answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer submitted on August 20, 2019, is accepted as timely filed.
